Hello there! I am an NYC Product Designer specializing in UX Design, Visual Design, and Front-End Development. I am inspired by compassion, curiosity, and all things geeky!

I combine lean UX methodologies, HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, and jQuery to implement meaningful and memorable experiences. Currently available for hire!
